load

public void load(java.util.ArrayList<Player> players)
This method loads player information from a CSV file.

Parameters:
players - The ArrayList where each player will be loaded into, from each row of the CSV file.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - - This exception is thrown if there is an issue with the CSV file. The CSV file must be formatted like the one included with this project.
